config.title: Monthly Report By Banner By Outlet

content.sql:
WITH qli AS ( SELECT store.STORE_CODE AS storeCode, store.STORE_NAME AS storeName, dict.DICT_ITEM_ID AS bannerId, dict.ITEM_NAME AS bannerName, dict1.DICT_ITEM_ID AS typeId, dict1.ITEM_NAME AS typeName,
brand.DICT_ITEM_ID AS brandId, brand.ITEM_NAME AS brandName, mp.PROD_CODE AS prodCode, mp.PROD_ALIAS AS prodName, mp.SORT AS P_SORT, brand.SORT AS B_SORT, dict.SORT AS CROP_SORT,
sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-1 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-1 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_1, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-2 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-2 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_2, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-3 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-3 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_3, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-4 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-4 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_4, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-5 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-5 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_5, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-6 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-6 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_6, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-7 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-7 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_7, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-8 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-8 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_8, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-9 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-9 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_9, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-10 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-10 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_10, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-11 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-11 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_11, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-12 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-12 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_12, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-13 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-13 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_13, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-14 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-14 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_14, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-15 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-15 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_15, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-16 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-16 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_16, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-17 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-17 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_17, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-18 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-18 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_18, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-19 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-19 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_19, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-20 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-20 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_20, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-21 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-21 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_21, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-22 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-22 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_22, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-23 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-23 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_23, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-24 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-24 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_24, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-25 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-25 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_25, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-26 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-26 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_26, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-27 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-27 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_27, sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-28 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-28 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TD_28,
--判断当前年月中是否有29号 CASE WHEN convert(INT,$Month$)=2 AND (convert(INT,$Year$)%400=0 OR convert(INT,$Year$)%4=0 AND convert(INT,$Year$)%100<>0) THEN sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-29 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-29 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) ELSE 0 END AS TD_29, --判断当前年月中是否有30号 CASE WHEN convert(INT,$Month$)<>2 THEN sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-30 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-30 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) ELSE 0 END AS TD_30, --判断当前年月中是否有31号 CASE WHEN convert(INT,$Month$)=1 OR convert(INT,$Month$)=3 OR convert(INT,$Month$)=5 OR convert(INT,$Month$)=7 OR convert(INT,$Month$)=8 OR convert(INT,$Month$)=10 OR convert(INT,$Month$)=12 THEN sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE>=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-31 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE<=$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-31 23:59:59' THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) ELSE 0 END AS TD_31,
--本月累计 sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE >= $Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-1 0:00:00' AND dds.BILL_DATE <= dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-01')+1, 0)) THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS TM_MONTH, --去年同月累计 sum(CASE WHEN dds.BILL_DATE >= dateadd(yy,-1,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(mm,0,$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-01'), 0)) AND dds.BILL_DATE <= dateadd(yy,-1,dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0, $Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-01')+1, 0))) THEN (dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.prod_quantity)) ELSE 0 END) AS LM_MONTH
FROM DMS_DATA_SALE as dds INNER JOIN DMS_PROD_MAPPING dpm ON dds.PROD_CODE = dpm.DIST_PROD_CODE AND dds.CLIENT_ID = dpm.CLIENT_ID AND dds.PROD_UNIT=dpm.DIST_PROD_UNIT AND dds.PROD_NAME=dpm.DIST_PROD_NAME INNER JOIN MDM_PRODUCT mp ON mp.PROD_CODE=dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE AND mp.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM as brand on mp.BRAND_ID = brand.DICT_ITEM_ID AND brand.DICT_ID = 'prodBrand'
INNER JOIN DMS_STORE_MAPPING as mapping on dds.STORE_CODE = mapping.DIST_STORE_CODE AND dds.CLIENT_ID=mapping.CLIENT_ID INNER JOIN MDM_STORE as store on store.STORE_CODE = mapping.TARGET_STORE_CODE AND store.CORP_ID IS NOT NULL AND store.NATURE_ID IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM as dict on store.CORP_ID = dict.DICT_ITEM_ID AND dict.DICT_ID = 'storeCorp' LEFT JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM as dict1 on store.NATURE_ID = dict1.DICT_ITEM_ID AND dict1.DICT_ID = 'storeNature'
LEFT JOIN DMS_CLIENT dc ON dds.CLIENT_ID = dc.CLIENT_ID LEFT JOIN MDM_DISTRIBUTOR md ON md.DIST_ID = dc.DIST_ID and store.DIST_ID=md.DIST_ID LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG bo ON bo.ORG_ID=md.ORG_ID
WHERE dds.BILL_DATE >= dateadd(yy,-1,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(mm,0,$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-01'), 0)) and dds.BILL_DATE <= dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,$Year$+'-'+$Month$+'-01')+1, 0)) and dds.state='1' $distId$ $orgId$ $typeId$ $bannerId$ $simsOrgId$ $brandId$ $skuName$ $orgSubCode$ and mp.PROD_CODE not in ('zengpin','qita','tingchan') GROUP BY store.STORE_CODE, store.STORE_NAME, dict.DICT_ITEM_ID, dict.ITEM_NAME, dict1.DICT_ITEM_ID, dict1.ITEM_NAME, brand.DICT_ITEM_ID, brand.ITEM_NAME, mp.PROD_CODE, mp.PROD_ALIAS, mp.SORT, brand.SORT, dict.SORT )
--创建临时表 SELECT * INTO #TEMP_REPORT_TABLE FROM qli
--从临时表中查询数据 SELECT a.parentId, a.selfId, a.a, a.d, a.e, a.f, a.g, a.TD_1, a.TD_2, a.TD_3, a.TD_4, a.TD_5, a.TD_6, a.TD_7, a.TD_8, a.TD_9, a.TD_10, a.TD_11, a.TD_12, a.TD_13, a.TD_14, a.TD_15, a.TD_16, a.TD_17, a.TD_18, a.TD_19, a.TD_20, a.TD_21, a.TD_22, a.TD_23, a.TD_24, a.TD_25, a.TD_26, a.TD_27, a.TD_28, a.TD_29, a.TD_30, a.TD_31, a.TM_MONTH, a.LM_MONTH, a.rt
FROM (
SELECT '0' as parentId, 'Total' as selfId, 'Grand' as a, '' as d, '' as e, '' as f, '' as g, 0 AS P_SORT, 0 AS B_SORT, sum(TD_1) as TD_1, sum(TD_2) as TD_2, sum(TD_3) as TD_3, sum(TD_4) as TD_4, sum(TD_5) as TD_5, sum(TD_6) as TD_6, sum(TD_7) as TD_7, sum(TD_8) as TD_8, sum(TD_9) as TD_9, sum(TD_10) as TD_10, sum(TD_11) as TD_11, sum(TD_12) as TD_12, sum(TD_13) as TD_13, sum(TD_14) as TD_14, sum(TD_15) as TD_15, sum(TD_16) as TD_16, sum(TD_17) as TD_17, sum(TD_18) as TD_18, sum(TD_19) as TD_19, sum(TD_20) as TD_20, sum(TD_21) as TD_21, sum(TD_22) as TD_22, sum(TD_23) as TD_23, sum(TD_24) as TD_24, sum(TD_25) as TD_25, sum(TD_26) as TD_26, sum(TD_27) as TD_27, sum(TD_28) as TD_28, sum(TD_29) as TD_29, sum(TD_30) as TD_30, sum(TD_31) as TD_31, sum(TM_MONTH) as TM_MONTH, sum(LM_MONTH) as LM_MONTH, CASE WHEN isnull(sum(TM_MONTH),0)=0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN isnull(sum(LM_MONTH),0)=0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE CAST(CAST(sum(TM_MONTH)/sum(LM_MONTH)*100 AS decimal(38,0)) AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as rt FROM #TEMP_REPORT_TABLE
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Total' as parentId, CAST(typeId AS VARCHAR) as selfId, 'Grand' as a, typeName as d, '' as e, '' as f, '' as g, 0 AS P_SORT, 0 AS B_SORT, sum(TD_1) as TD_1, sum(TD_2) as TD_2, sum(TD_3) as TD_3, sum(TD_4) as TD_4, sum(TD_5) as TD_5, sum(TD_6) as TD_6, sum(TD_7) as TD_7, sum(TD_8) as TD_8, sum(TD_9) as TD_9, sum(TD_10) as TD_10, sum(TD_11) as TD_11, sum(TD_12) as TD_12, sum(TD_13) as TD_13, sum(TD_14) as TD_14, sum(TD_15) as TD_15, sum(TD_16) as TD_16, sum(TD_17) as TD_17, sum(TD_18) as TD_18, sum(TD_19) as TD_19, sum(TD_20) as TD_20, sum(TD_21) as TD_21, sum(TD_22) as TD_22, sum(TD_23) as TD_23, sum(TD_24) as TD_24, sum(TD_25) as TD_25, sum(TD_26) as TD_26, sum(TD_27) as TD_27, sum(TD_28) as TD_28, sum(TD_29) as TD_29, sum(TD_30) as TD_30, sum(TD_31) as TD_31, sum(TM_MONTH) as TM_MONTH, sum(LM_MONTH) as LM_MONTH, CASE WHEN isnull(sum(TM_MONTH),0)=0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN isnull(sum(LM_MONTH),0)=0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE CAST(CAST(sum(TM_MONTH)/sum(LM_MONTH)*100 AS decimal(38,0)) AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as rt
FROM #TEMP_REPORT_TABLE GROUP BY typeId, typeName
UNION ALL
SELECT CAST(typeId AS VARCHAR) as parentId, CAST(typeId AS VARCHAR)+CAST(bannerId AS VARCHAR) as selfId, 'Grand' as a, typeName as d, bannerName as e, '' as f, '' as g, 0 AS P_SORT, 0 AS B_SORT, sum(TD_1) as TD_1, sum(TD_2) as TD_2, sum(TD_3) as TD_3, sum(TD_4) as TD_4, sum(TD_5) as TD_5, sum(TD_6) as TD_6, sum(TD_7) as TD_7, sum(TD_8) as TD_8, sum(TD_9) as TD_9, sum(TD_10) as TD_10, sum(TD_11) as TD_11, sum(TD_12) as TD_12, sum(TD_13) as TD_13, sum(TD_14) as TD_14, sum(TD_15) as TD_15, sum(TD_16) as TD_16, sum(TD_17) as TD_17, sum(TD_18) as TD_18, sum(TD_19) as TD_19, sum(TD_20) as TD_20, sum(TD_21) as TD_21, sum(TD_22) as TD_22, sum(TD_23) as TD_23, sum(TD_24) as TD_24, sum(TD_25) as TD_25, sum(TD_26) as TD_26, sum(TD_27) as TD_27, sum(TD_28) as TD_28, sum(TD_29) as TD_29, sum(TD_30) as TD_30, sum(TD_31) as TD_31, sum(TM_MONTH) as TM_MONTH, sum(LM_MONTH) as LM_MONTH, CASE WHEN isnull(sum(TM_MONTH),0)=0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN isnull(sum(LM_MONTH),0)=0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE CAST(CAST(sum(TM_MONTH)/sum(LM_MONTH)*100 AS decimal(38,0)) AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as rt
FROM #TEMP_REPORT_TABLE GROUP BY typeId, typeName, bannerId, bannerName
UNION ALL
SELECT CAST(typeId AS VARCHAR)+CAST(bannerId AS VARCHAR) as parentId, CAST(typeId AS VARCHAR)+CAST(bannerId AS VARCHAR)+CAST(storeCode AS VARCHAR) as selfId, 'Grand' as a, typeName as d, bannerName as e, storeName as f, '' as g, 0 AS P_SORT, 0 AS B_SORT, sum(TD_1) as TD_1, sum(TD_2) as TD_2, sum(TD_3) as TD_3, sum(TD_4) as TD_4, sum(TD_5) as TD_5, sum(TD_6) as TD_6, sum(TD_7) as TD_7, sum(TD_8) as TD_8, sum(TD_9) as TD_9, sum(TD_10) as TD_10, sum(TD_11) as TD_11, sum(TD_12) as TD_12, sum(TD_13) as TD_13, sum(TD_14) as TD_14, sum(TD_15) as TD_15, sum(TD_16) as TD_16, sum(TD_17) as TD_17, sum(TD_18) as TD_18, sum(TD_19) as TD_19, sum(TD_20) as TD_20, sum(TD_21) as TD_21, sum(TD_22) as TD_22, sum(TD_23) as TD_23, sum(TD_24) as TD_24, sum(TD_25) as TD_25, sum(TD_26) as TD_26, sum(TD_27) as TD_27, sum(TD_28) as TD_28, sum(TD_29) as TD_29, sum(TD_30) as TD_30, sum(TD_31) as TD_31, sum(TM_MONTH) as TM_MONTH, sum(LM_MONTH) as LM_MONTH, CASE WHEN isnull(sum(TM_MONTH),0)=0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN isnull(sum(LM_MONTH),0)=0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE CAST(CAST(sum(TM_MONTH)/sum(LM_MONTH)*100 AS decimal(38,0)) AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as rt
FROM #TEMP_REPORT_TABLE GROUP BY typeId, typeName, bannerId, bannerName, storeCode, storeName
UNION ALL
SELECT CAST(typeId AS VARCHAR)+CAST(bannerId AS VARCHAR)+CAST(storeCode AS VARCHAR) as parentId, CAST(typeId AS VARCHAR)+CAST(bannerId AS VARCHAR)+CAST(storeCode AS VARCHAR)+CAST(brandId AS VARCHAR) as selfId, 'Grand' as a, typeName as d, bannerName as e, storeName as f, brandName as g, 0 AS P_SORT, B_SORT AS B_SORT, sum(TD_1) as TD_1, sum(TD_2) as TD_2, sum(TD_3) as TD_3, sum(TD_4) as TD_4, sum(TD_5) as TD_5, sum(TD_6) as TD_6, sum(TD_7) as TD_7, sum(TD_8) as TD_8, sum(TD_9) as TD_9, sum(TD_10) as TD_10, sum(TD_11) as TD_11, sum(TD_12) as TD_12, sum(TD_13) as TD_13, sum(TD_14) as TD_14, sum(TD_15) as TD_15, sum(TD_16) as TD_16, sum(TD_17) as TD_17, sum(TD_18) as TD_18, sum(TD_19) as TD_19, sum(TD_20) as TD_20, sum(TD_21) as TD_21, sum(TD_22) as TD_22, sum(TD_23) as TD_23, sum(TD_24) as TD_24, sum(TD_25) as TD_25, sum(TD_26) as TD_26, sum(TD_27) as TD_27, sum(TD_28) as TD_28, sum(TD_29) as TD_29, sum(TD_30) as TD_30, sum(TD_31) as TD_31, sum(TM_MONTH) as TM_MONTH, sum(LM_MONTH) as LM_MONTH, CASE WHEN isnull(sum(TM_MONTH),0)=0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN isnull(sum(LM_MONTH),0)=0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE CAST(CAST(sum(TM_MONTH)/sum(LM_MONTH)*100 AS decimal(38,0)) AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as rt
FROM #TEMP_REPORT_TABLE AS base GROUP BY typeId, typeName, bannerId, bannerName, storeCode, storeName, brandId, brandName, B_SORT
) AS a ORDER BY a.B_SORT
--删除临时表 IF object_id('tempdb..#TEMP_REPORT_TABLE') IS NOT NULL BEGIN DROP TABLE #TEMP_REPORT_TABLE END
